Articles.Content:
Is there a mod that adds like, huge asteroids? I find E class asteroids aren't adequate for fuel mining, even with nuclear engines I can only get about 800 m/s of delta v out of them. Any mods that add F or even G asteroids?

Thanks.
In this thread Sharpy has a MM patch - looks like it was derived from RoverDudes work. Warning - one of the posts mentions that the larger the asteroid the worse the collision box matches.

USI Asteroid Recycling Tech makes asteroids much more massive without making them bigger.

JNSQ and RSS and a few other planet packs make asteroids larger and more massive but I'm sure you're not looking to change your planets, so USI ART is the answer.

Asteroid classes above E are used by KSP 1.10's comets. The range is F to I.

You have another fuel problem in addition, if I may point out.  You want to move super-massive asteroids with stock engines/ stock fuel. NASA knows better than to try that IRL. USI ART and Stockalike Mining Expansion  contain Mass Driver engines which make much more effective use of Ore than the usual process of converting it to LF for liquid engines.

Edited October 26, 2020 by JadeOfMaar

14 hours ago, JadeOfMaar said:

The range is F to I.

Biggest I've seen so far is H. Time to polish those lenses a bit more I guess ;)
Yeah in the game i keep seeing new asteroids up to H class and i don't know what mod they come from. after 1.10 is when they spawned i so maybe what your asking for is stock but idk
